Question: This person called the island (in what is now The Bahamas) San Salvador; the natives called it Guanahani.
Hints: In one of his writings, this person claims to have gone to the sea at the age of 10.
In 1479, this person reached his brother Bartolomeo in Lisbon, while continuing trading for the Centurione family.
This person took more natives prisoner and continued his exploration.
